title: How to Remove a Twibbon

steps.headline: Sign in.
steps.description: You can sign in using your Twitter name if wished - the link is at the top right hand corner of the page.

steps.headline: Click on the dropdown list besides your login name.
Click on the "History".

steps.headline: Go through your different.

steps.headline: Check your Twitter account to see your new avatar.

steps.headline: Change your original avatar by going to Twitter.

text: Steps Return to the Twibbon homepage. This is located at http://www.twibbon.com. Sign in. You can sign in using your Twitter name if wished - the link is at the top right hand corner of the page. Click on the dropdown list besides your login name.  Click on the "History". This is where you will find the "Avatar History" retained since you joined Twibbon. Go through your different. Select the one that you want to remove and click on "Hide this". The avatar image you have selected will be removed as your profile image. Check your Twitter account to see your new avatar. Be patient if the avatar image does not revert on Twitter - it may be immediate, or it can take up to 24 hours for this change to come through. Alternate method Change your original avatar by going to Twitter. This can be found at: https://www.twitter.com. click "Edit Profile" button.  The first option will be "Picture". You have the options to "Change Image" or "Delete Image". Choose whichever you prefer. Place your new avatar on Twitter. The Twibbon will have been removed because you have removed the avatar image that carried it. Upload either your original avatar or a new one, as wished.
